alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 8:25AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, northeastern Bay, northwestern Calhoun, eastern Holmes and Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 800 AM CDT... At 724 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Vernon to 14 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek. Movement was north at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Marianna, Bradford, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Altha, Alford, Wausau, Esto, Campbellton, Noma, Black, Moose Pond, Whitehead Crossroads, Camps Head and Holmes Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
